baiter: Norman Gorman Smith-Bidet III & Gonad McDangle
title: More twists than a twisty thing

messages.subject: your urgent assistance is needed in this transactuion
messages.body:
Dear Respected one,

I write to solicit your assistance for a transaction of mutual benefit,believing
that you will treat this with utmost confidence.I implore you to excuse me of any
embarrassment this letter might cause you, as we have not met before.

I am Miss maureen adje charlse from Sierra Leone.The only surviving daughter of Mr
and mrs CHARLSE ADJE Before now l didn't have any problem, until l lost my parents
and my two brothers two years ago.

They were attacked by rebels on their way back from a visit.Only my father survived
the attack, he had severe bullet wounds. He was rushed to the hospital where the
bullets were removed after a surgical operation.My dad returned home after two weeks
feeling well and okay.

But two months later, my father became sick.His situation deteriorated so much that
he couldn't carry on with his work anymore.One day, he told me to prepare myself
that we have to travel to Ivory Coast, that he has to deposit some money (USD$16 000
000.00) in a Security Company in Ivory Coast for safe keeping.We then arranged for a
quick travel.The money was arranged in a trunk box and shipped to Ivory Coast by
diplomatic means.

At the Security Company in Ivory Coast, my late father deposited the trunk box as a
bonded shipment and he declared it as family treasures.My father made me the
beneficiary of the deposit.

Meanwhile,not too long we returned from Ivory Coast, my father died.After the burial
rights, my late father's brothers came to the house to inform me that my late father
willed all his properties to them.With this stupid news they brought me, l decided
to take them to court.Every time we go to court for hearing,the court ends up
adjoining the case.The court ordered that nobody should touch the properties until
the case is decided.And this is the second year running.I am at the moment living in
Ivory Coast for the fear that my uncles can attempt to kill me.

My father was a big time diamond dealer, he started having difficulties with bank
transactions in respect of making deposits and receiving payments for diamonds
purchased by his customers because of the United Nation's embargo on diamonds from
West Africa at that time.Because of the problem my father started storing cash in
the house.

The problem l am faced with now, is how to get this money out of Ivory Coast to a
stable country where l can have the money secured in a bank.The worst of all is
that, l can not at this time declare the true content of the deposit to the Security
Company since my late father did not declare it at the time of deposit. And with the
rebel problem this country is faced with at the moment, l can be killed because of
the money.So right now, l am looking for a foreign partner that can assist me in
getting this money out of Ivory Coast to a safe country.

That is the reason why I offered you 15 % of the total money amount, and another 5%
in case of any other necessary expenses you might incure during and after this
transaction.

Mind you,try your best possible to negotiate for me some profitable blue chip
investment opportunities which is risk free which I can invest with this money after
retrieving the consignments that contain the money out of the company and immediate
transferred to your designated account, personally I am interested in estate
management and hotel business, please advise.

I wait to hear from you.

Thanks and God bless.

Yours sincerely,

Miss maureen adje charlse
messages.raw:
Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 8
Email 1

messages.subject: i await to hear from you soonest
messages.body:
> Dear Gorman Smith-Bidet,

Call me Uncle Stink, all my friends do.

>    A very nice day to you and your entire family,

Oh dear. My entire family were eaten by wolves three years ago in the Mugubayter
Mountains while on a camping trip. No one knows why I was left alone, but friends
say it may have been my aroma.

Anyway, the point is that that was not a good way to start your letter. I have no
family. You were not to know but you should be more careful.

> i recieved your mail and the content was not well
> understood.

I am sorry if you did not understand my email. I must make allowance for your
limited intelligence and feeble education. I will attempt to be clearer in the
future.

> until my dire need for a foriegn partner to assist me in
> this transaction.

Well now you have found you Uncle Stink

> try to get back to me as soon as you recieve
> this message for me to know if we can proceed in the release
> and transfer of the fund into your nominated account abroad.

Oh yes go ahead, Uncle Stink is here to help you in any way I can

messages.subject: UNCLE,I WILL HAVE TO WAIT TILL TOMMOROW BEFORE I CAN SEND YOU THE DOCUMENT REQUIRED
messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

A VERY NICE DAY TO YOU.

I ACTUALLY SENT YOU A MAIL BEFORE NOW THIS MORNING,WITH THE HOPE THAT I WILL HAVE TO
LEAVE THE INTERIOUR WHERE I LIVE TO THE TOWN TO SEND YOU THE DOCUMENTS BUT I COULD
NOT SEND IT TO THE FAX NUMBER YOU SENT ME DUE TO THE FACT THAT THE OPERATOR SAID
THERE IS NO CODE NUMBER ATTACHED TO IT, I WENT AS FAR AS TRYING TO SEND IT THROUGH
THE ATTACHMENT IN MY MAIL BOX THROUGH SCANNING BUT THERE WAS NOLONGER TIME AGAIN
BECAUSE I MIGHT MISS THE LAST BUS GOING TO THE INTERIOR PART OF THE CITY WHERE I AM
PRESENTELY RESIDING.SO I HAVE TO LEAVE AND LEAVE EVERTHING TILL TOMMOROW .

SIR,PLEASE BEAR WITH ME FOR NOW,I WILL SEND THE LODGEMENT CERTICATE TO YOU FIRST
THING TOMORROW MORNNING SO THAT YOU CAN CONTACT THE BANK FOR THE TRANSFERING OF THE
MONEY ABROAD TO YOUR NOMINATED ACCOUNT.

I ONCE AGAIN THANK YOU FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING.

BEST REGARD,

YOUR LITTLE GIRL,

MAUREEN.

messages.body:
Dear Uncle Stink,

A very nice day to you and how are you today?I hope all is well with you?.If so
thanks be to GOD almighty.i really have not heard from you and i belive you should
be back by now,

the political situation over here in Abidjan in geting worse due to the outbreak of
rebel forces rebeling against the government of this country,as as a matter of fact i
would want you to hurry up in this transaction by contacting the bank for the release
and transfering of the fund over to the bank account you will have to provide.

Secoundly,i would also want to hear your eldely advice on the kind of business
venture we will go into with this money  as soon as it gets to you overthere in your
country.

I will wait to hear from you soonest so that i can start preparing to come over to
the U.K

may GOD bless you for your concern,

best regard,

Maureen.

messages.subject: YOU ARE WELLCOME BACK HOME
messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

A VERY NICE DAY TO YOU AND HOW ARE YOU TODAY.I GUESE ALL IS MOVING WITH YOU
POSITIVELY,IF SO THANKS BE TO GOD.

SIR, I HAVE BEEN ACTUALLY THINKING THAT YOU SHOULD AQUINT ME WITH SOME KIND OF
PROFITABLE INVESTMENT THAT WE CAN GO INTO WITH THIS MONEY AS SOON AS THIS MONEY IS
TRANSFERED TO YOUR ACCOUNT  OVERTHERE IN THE UK.BECAUSE ,

BEFORE THE DEATH OF MY LATE FATHER ,HE ADVICED ME TO GO INTO ESTATE BUSINESS WITH
THIS FUND BUT I DONT KNOW IF REAL ESTATE BUSINESS WILL BE PROFITABLE OVER THER IN
U.K, DUE TO THIS REASON I WOULD WANT YOUR ELDERLY ADVICE ON THE TYPE OF INVESTMENT
WE WILL GO INTO.

SIR,I WOULD ALSO WANT YOU TO CONTACT THE BANK IMMEDIATELY BECAUSE ON MY LAST VISIT
TO THE BANK DIRECTORS OFFICE AFTER A LONG DISCUSION WITH HIM THAT MY FORIEGN PATRTNER
WILL BE CONTACTING HIM FOR THE TRANSFER OF THIS FUND AT THEIR BANK CUSTODY TO ANY
ACCOUNT YOU ARE GOING TO PROVIDE FOR THEM,HE MADE ME UNDERSTAND THAT AS SOON AS THEY
HEAR FROM YOU THEY CAN EFFECT THE TRANSFERING OF THE MONEY WITHIN SEVEN BANK WORKING
DAYS.

UNCLE,I AM REALLY ON YOU IN THIS TRANSACTION AND I WOULD ALSO LIKE YOU TO BE THE
GUIDIAN OF THIS FUND IN ANY BUSINESS THAT WE WILL GO INTO WHILE I WILL HAVE TO
CONTINUE MY EDUCATION IN A GOOD SCHOOL OVER THERE.

AS SOON AS YOU CONTACT THE BANK YOU SHOULD ALSO GET BACK TO ME SO THAT I WILL HAVE
TO BE PREPARING TO COME OVER TO U.K.

THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN AND MAY GOD ALMIGHTY BLESS YOU IN YOUR PERSONAL ENDERVOUR.

BEST REGARD

MAUREEN

messages.subject: Re: YOU ARE WELLCOME BACK HOME
messages.body:
Maureen,

As for a profitable venture I am getting in to 'dwarf-throwing' contests in a big
way. This is a hugely popular sport over here and I have just invested in a large
venue that will allow up to 10 throwers at a time. I'd be delighted to have you as a
partner.

In your last email you ask me to contact the bank but you fail to give me their
contact details. Don't worry we all make mistakes and it must be quite awe inspiring
for you to correspond with someone who has had a decent education.

Your Uncle Stink

first, i must let you know that i trust and really on you now and i also intend

infact i can not wait to be with you over there in the UK. so as a matter that

affidafite showing that you are the late father's business associate.He should

your involvement with Miss Maureen Adje because there is a clause dectating that she

communications.

messages.subject: PLEASE CONTACT THE LAWYER IMMEDIATELY
messages.body:
Dear Uncle Stink,

I thank you most sincerely for the extent you have gone just try and let us conclude
because now that we have alarted the bank of our readiness in coming to collect our
fund please try and provide your time for this transfer so that we can have our
money and immediately start our investment together.

Immediately I saw your mail I first of all went to the bank to know exactly what
they want and what we must do and I was refer to the bank Legal department and your
story was confirmed that we need to submit all those documents as at when I went I
got to know from the bank that you have forwarded them with two of the requirement
for the transfer. I therefor ask them how can we get this rest one very good staff
now refer me to his friend who is a senoir advocate in this country which you will
contact, though I have met and spook with him over the issue and he has accepted to
do it for us but will be expecting that you contact him your self simply because you
will be the person that the transfer will be madein your name and your bank.

He is Barrister Davis Ike of Ike Davis Chambers his direct number is +225-0749-9491.
while his email is : davis_ike@yahoo.com

Should in case you will want to send mail to him first.

Please when you contact him just tell him direct for what we need him to do for us
because I have told him already.

remember that this below item is what we need him to do for us.

A. Documents that will show that we are partners.
According to the Lawyer he says it is AGREEMENT DOCUMENT between you and me.

B.Certificate of change of ownership to bear your name as my partner/beneficiary and
the claimer of the fund.

C.The affidavite of claim to enable the bank effect the transfer directly into your
bank account that you have provided.

D.The lodgement reciept is the document which I have given to you before so kindly
send a copy to the bank immediately.

From the above it means that what we need now is A, B and C since we already have
D.

Do contact the lawyer to help us know how much it will cost us to obtain those three
documents needed urgently.

waiting to hear from you soonest so that we can proceed.

best regard

Maureen.
comments:
First a banker and now a lawyer.
This baiting business is getting complicated.

messages.subject: YES I HAVE GONE AHEAD WITH THE LAWYER
messages.body:
Dear Uncle Stink,

Thank you for giving me a go ahead of contacting the lawyer myself because that has
produced good result today,for I was with him and we both went to the Federal
ministry of justice together to get the documents arranged.

At the ministry of justice we gathered that to get one document through that we need
$1,200.00 dollars  because they are sensitive bank documents and because we need
three of such documents that means that we will need a total of $3,600.00 plus
$1,000.00 been the Lawyers consultance fees.

I got to know that from the ministry of justice that we can get this document
collected as from tomorrow because the lawyer will do more assignment for us due to
the fact that since you will not be coming down to sign for the fund released order
then you can give the lawyer a power of attorney to help sign the fund released
order on your behalf simply because your name and account is where the fund will be
transfered into.

I will await your quick response to this effect.

Best Regards.

Maureen,

I thank you for your mail and i am just coming from my visit to the bank and they

morning.

you fill and return the form which they will forward to you and the documents
required is forwarded to them ,they will effect the transfering of the fund into the
bank account that you provided to them.

So as a matter that requires urgency ,which is due to the unstable political
situation of this country i would want us to proceed in this transfer so that i can
leave here immediately the fund gets to your account,So Uncle what do you suggest we
do to get these documents obtain, because the bank director made me understand that
the bank process in transfering the fund to your account will be concluded within
the next seven bank working days.

justice .

i will wait to hear from you soonest

and also Uncle Stink,now that i have to be preparing to come over to U.K dont you
think it will be good for me to have your photograph so that i can know the person i
have choosen to be my godfather in the nearest future.

messages.subject: WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU SOONEST
messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

A VERY NICE DAY TO YOU, THANKS FOR YOUR MAIL MESSAGE.THANKS FOR THE PHOTOGRAPH YOU
SENT TO ME ,IT IS GRATE KNOWING YOU FACIALLY.

I WAS AT THE OFFICE OF THE BARRISTER WHO IS TO ASSIST US IN THE OBTAINING OF THE
DOCUMENTS REQUIRED BY THE BANK,

BUT THE PROBLEM I AM FACED WITH NOW IS THE MONEY REQUIRED TO OBTAIN THESES DOCUMENTS
AT THE MINISTRY OF JUSTICE AND THE ARTTORNEY ALSO TOLD ME THAT HE WILL ALSO BE PAID A
THOUSAND U.S DOLLARS($1000.00) FOR THE SERVICE HE WILL RENDER IN GOING TO SWEAR AN
AVIDAVITE ON YOUR BEHALF.BUT HE HAS AGREED THAT HIS OWN IS NO PROBLEM BUT THE FEES
MUST BE PAID AT THE MINISTRY OF JUSTICE BEFORE THEY WILL ISSUE OUT THE NECASSARY
DOCUMENTS WE NEED.

UNCLE ,I REALLY DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO ,DUE TO MY PRESENT SITUATION I CAN NOT RAISE
SUCH AN AMOUNT TO OBTAIN THESES DOCUMENTS ,I HAVE EVEN PLEADED WITH THE ARTTONEY TO
TRY HIS BEST TO ASSIST US SO THAT AS SOON AS THE FUND IS TRANSFERED TO YOUR ACCOUNT
YOU WILL SEND ME SOME MONEY TO PAY UP FOR EVERYTHING BUT HE REFUSED,HE MADE ME
UNDERSTAND THAT THIS AMOUNT MUST BE PAID AS CHARGE FEES BEFORE THEY WILL ISSUE THESE
DOCUMENTS TO US AT THE MINISTRY OF JUSTICE.

UNCLE STINK,AT THIS TIME I MUST SOLICITE FOR YOUR ASSISTANCE IN SENDING THE MONEY
TO THE ARTTONEY TO ENABLE US CONCLUDE THE TRANSFERING OF THIS FUND OUT OF AFRICA
HERE TO YOUR PROVIDED ACCOUNT OR ALTERNATIVELY I WOULD WANT YOU TO CALL AND DISCUSE
WITH THE ARTTONEY TO KNOW IF THERE IS ANY OTHER WAY OUT TO OBTAIN THESES NECESSARY
DOCUMENTS.

UNCLE,I AM REALLY KIN IN LEAVING THIS SHORE TO U.K IN THE NEAREST FUTURE.I AWAIT
TO HEAR YOUR ELDERLY ADVICE TOWARDS THIS ISSUE.

BEST REGARD

MAUREEN.

messages.subject: please try to send the money to obtain the necassary documents required by the bank
messages.body:
Dear Uncle Stink,

A very nice day to you and how is the day today?i hope all is moving
positively.First i must have to thank you so much for the steps taken so far in the
successful transfering process of this fund out of Africa to U.K

Uncle,i am very happy to know also that you have been making all arrangement already
for the sucessfull investment of this fund over there in your country.

The problem that i am faced with now is how to raise the money needed to obtain
these documents from the ministry of justice ,as i have already told you before now
,I am just a girl of 19 years old and i am not a citizen of this country, I dont
have that amount of money presentely to pay for the obtaining of theses documents
required by the bank and i dont have any relatives around that i can meet for such
an amount ,and more over my late father adviced me before he finally died on his
hospital sick bed that i should not allow any of his relatives or his business
associates to know about the where about of this fund and he went as far as telling
me not to go back to our country SERRIA LEONE,been that the money was deposited in
BANK OF AFRICA here in Abidjan .If he eventually dies that i should move further to
look for a foriegn partner that can assist in the transfering of this fund out of
Africa to his country and I have to leave here to continue my education abroad and
my choosen foriegn partner will also be capable of assisting me in the investment of
this money in a profitable business venture while he will provide me with a good
school to continue my education and he or she will be the guidian of any investment
venture we will have to go into till I complet my education.

If you say that you will leave me to deal with the other matters,that means we will
have to delay in this transaction because I will have to travel to Freetown the
capital of our country where we use to reside to sell some of my late fathers
property ,this I already know will take a lot of time,and also in my attempt to do
that I will also exposing my life to danger because of the advice my late father
gave to me that when his relative and his business partners knows about the where
about of this money he deposited in the bank here in Abidjan the economic capital of
Ivory coast.they would want to kill me and made away with the money.

Uncle,i will still insist that you send the money required to the arttoney so that i
will have to follow him to the ministry of justice to obtain the documents required
so that this fund can be transfered to you in next week.

Uncle stink,I really dont want us to delay in this transaction due to the fact that
the political situation of this country presentely is not stable and as aresult i am
kin in living Africa in the nearest future,and you should also know that as soon as
this fund is transfered to you your expenses that you made will first of all be
deducted before we finally start with the investment process.

I am hoping on you for the sucess of this transaction and I will wait to hear from
you soonest so that i will inform the arttoney on when I will be coming to his
office for us to go to the ministry of justice together to obtain these documents
required to effect the transfer to your provided bank account.after which i will
submit it to the bank for them to transfer the fund to you because yesterday they
recomfirm to me atthe bank that as soon as the documents required are available they
will wire the money to U.K within seven(7) bank working days.

Thanks once again for your concern and I also pray that almighty God will also bless
you in all your own personal endervour.

Best regard ,

MAUREEN.

Scam 8

messages.subject: Money
messages.body:
Maureen,

I note your predicament. Please clearly list each item needed and the cost.
Also provide your bank account details for transfer.

Now that we are getting in to delicate financial territory, I think it best if I ask
you to add a security phrase to each of your emails. This will ensure that I know
that the email is genuine. For greater security I will change the phrase each time.
I hope this does not complicate matters too much for you. It is really not too
difficult and even someone with your limited education should be able to follow it.

Most important is the placement of the security phrase. This we will agree now and
will not mention again. In this way, if someone intercepts our communication, and
tries to use the security phrase, they are most likely to place it in the wrong
position. I will then know that the communication is false.

ALWAYS place the security phrase straight after the salutation. So, to be clear,
your email will start "Dear Uncle Stink" and then you will place the security phrase
and then complete the email.

I hope that is clear.

Your Uncle Stink

Security Phrase for your next email:
It's good to touch the green, green grass of home.

Whats the Bloody Point?
Scam 8
Email 40

messages.subject: i will wait to hear from you so that we can proceed
messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

It's good to touch the green, green grass of home.

I recieved your mail and the content was well understood,First ,i must not hesitate
to thank you for your concern for the success of this transaction.

The documents required by the bank are as follows.

(1). Documents that will show that we are partners.
According to the Lawyer he says it is AGREEMENT DOCUMENT between you and me.
$1,200

(2).Certificate of change of ownership to bear your name as my partner/beneficiary
and the claimer of the fund.$1,200.

(3).The affidavite of claim to enable the bank effect the transfer directly into
your bank account that you have provided.$1,200.

(4).The lodgement reciept is already with me ,that is the document which I have
given to you before ,so i will include it as soon as we get the others and submit it
to the bank to effect the transfering of the fund to your provided bank account.

And the lawyer said he will paid a thousand dollars($1,000) too for the service he
will render in obtaing theses documents for us.so we are faced with an expenses
which will amount to $4,600.

As for a bank account,i dont have an account of my own here in abidjan,so Uncle ,i

messages.subject: Your Money
messages.body:
Maureen,

I sent Gonad my butler to the local Western Union agent with the UK sterling
equivalent of $4,600 plus a little extra for any fees. Gonad tells me that Western
Union agent was very insistent that money can not be sent to Africa any more using a
control number and secret question. They will only allow sending using proof of
identity and the exact destination office has to be specified.

So this is what he has done. There is $4,600 waiting for you at:

Western Union Agent
LA POSTE
ROUTE DE L'HOSPITAL
ABENGOUROU
COTE D'IVOIRE

In the name: Ms MAUREEN ADJE

Apparently you have to go to that exact office and you can only claim the money if
you provide some type of international proof of identity.

Please let me know after you have collected the money that everything is in order.

Your Uncle Stink

The next secret phrase is:
My, my, my, Delilah
Why, why, why, Delilah
comments:

Will "Maureen" have to pay good money for a forged identity?

messages.subject: Problem
messages.body:
Maureen,

I have just pulled Gonad in to my office for a good talking to. It seems that he was
told that Western Union will not transfer to Abidjan any longer due to what they
apparently called 519 fraud. Apparently the Abidjan office can no longer be trusted
because of this 519 fraud. Do you know what they are talking about?

They use the same reason for stopping the control number and secret question
transfer and now insist on identity proof.

It seems my hands are tied. If you need the money you will have to travel a bit.
There is no alternative.

Gonad is a good servant who has been with me for many years. He has saved my life on
two occasions and I trust him like a brother. He would not lie to me.

Your Uncle Stink

The next secret phrase is:
Pussycat, Pussycat
I've got flowers
And lots of hours

messages.subject: Maureen
messages.body:
Dear Maureen (or whatever your real name is)

I am Gonad McDangle. I am Sir Norman's butler and right hand man. Everything Sir
Norman does is known to me, and as you have already seen he trusts me completely. I
see every email he writes and every mail he receives. Nothing passes me by.

Maureen, Sir Norman is stupid, I am not, I know you are a 419 Scammer and I made up
the story about the Western Union office. Sir Norman has not seen your latest email
about Amsterdam and I still have the money as a cheque because I didn't want it
going to you and your associates before we have an understanding in place.

Be aware that Sir Norman is seriously rich. There is no reason why you shouldn't get
hundreds of thousands of pounds from him. But to do so you need me on your side as I
control his every waking hour.

I propose the following. I assist you in liberating considerable sums of money from
Sir Norman in return for 40% of the total received.

I look forward to your early reply and agreement. Without my help you will not get
to Sir Norman. I hope you can see that.

Gonad McDangle

messages.subject: I am in despair
messages.body:
Maureen,

I have put your life in danger and for that I am most repentant. As you have not
emailed me for a whole week I can only assume the worse and guess you will never see
this email. However I will continue to write this in the hope that you will see it.

I am in despair, Gonad my butler is dead.

As you know, three years ago I lost my entire family in the Mugubayter Mountains
while on a camping trip. Now I have caused you to come to harm and on top of that a
monstrous tragedy has befallen my life. My one true friend and trusted servant is no
more. The circumstances of his death are just terrible. I can not put in to words my
loss and sadness.

I have scanned in this morning's newspaper so that you can see for yourself. It is
attached to this email.

Please Maureen if you are still alive, find a way to contact me.

Your Uncle Stink

The next secret phrase is:
It's not unusual it happens every day no matter what you say
You find it happens all the time

messages.subject: Your Email
messages.body:
Maureen,

I am both joyful and confused to read your email. I am overjoyed that you are not
dead as I feared. Please tell me where you have been and why you have not replied to
my emails?

I am confused and angry that you should question the tragic death of my one true
friend Gonad. Did you not read the newspaper article I sent you?

Your email seems to go on to blame my trusted servant for your lack of
communication. Maureen why would you choose to speak ill of the dead? The actions
you seem to be attributing to Gorman are so far from this gentle and honest mans
true character that I can only assume you are attempting to make a sick joke out of
the mans death. Shame on you Maureen, you should know better.

I am not interested in speaking any more of my dear, loyal right-hand-man. To even
write about him makes me too emotional. I hope you feel bad about writing such silly
things in your last email.

On to our business, Maureen. The dwarf throwing complex is nearly complete and I
would wish you to come over to inspect and sign some partnership papers. If you can
get over in the next week you will be in time for the funeral of Gonad.

We have decided to leave the remains of his house on the beach and allow Mother
Nature to wear it away gradually. He would have appreciated that being such a kind
and gentle person.

Your Uncle Stink

The next secret phrase is:
So he strikes, like Thunderball.
He knows the meaning of success.
His needs are more, so he gives less.

messages.subject: Proceed
messages.body:
Maureen thank you for your kind words.

I am still hurting inside. The loss of Gonad is almost too much to bear. You kind
words ease the pain slightly and for that I am grateful.

Please go ahead and proceed to transfer the funds and arrange your flight. Let me
know when you are arriving in London and I will have my private helicopter pick you
up and bring you to the estate.

Your Uncle Stink

messages.subject: Re: Bank Transfer
messages.body:
Maureen,

You did not use the secret phrase. Please be sure to use it next time.

Your email surprises me greatly. Firstly I am upset that you should be so insulting
to black people. To say that all black people are evil is nothing short of racism
and we have laws against that type of talk here. Was your father a right wing
extremist?

Secondly, I am not sure you did understand the content of my bank manager's email.
He is suggesting that you may be part of an advance fee fraud. A similar suggestion
was made by the Western Union office to my late friend. So I must admit it now has
me doubting somewhat.

Maureen, I have to follow the advice of my friend and bank manager. As you have
seen, he says:
> The only way to be certain is to get your associate living over there
> in the toilet to send you some lose change, say $50 by bank or money
> transfer. If they are willing to do that then you can be sure they are
> not fraudsters.

So Maureen I am now asking you for a proof of your good faith. It is a small token
and it is not the money that's important, it's the gesture. I have got the $4,600
secured and ready to send. All I am asking is for a small token to prove your good
faith. I will add $100 to the total to make sure all your expenses are covered.

Maureen please arrange to send over by Western Union $50 for the name "Smith Bidet"
with secret phrase "--- --- ---".
THIS GESTURE is very important for me.

Don't make a mistake, I want to help you but I need to show my bank that you are
genuine.

Your Uncle Stink

The next secret phrase remains as last time due to your lack of use.

messages.subject: Your Email
messages.body:
Maureen you are still using the wrong secret phrase. That is the one before last.
I'll put the new secret phrase at the bottom of this email again so that you do not
get it wrong next time.

I am concerned now as to what the delay is. I thought you were arranging to send the
$50 so that I can show my bank that you are genuine.

I have had a single phone message from the President but his English was very bad
and I would find it hard to have a decent conversation with him. Plus it is not me
he has to convince it is Rob Slicker, my friend and my Bank Manager.

I asked Rob if he wants to ring the President for me and he said that nothing would
be gained from a conversation and the only way he would be convinced that I am not a
victim of an advance fee fraud is if money is sent in this direction first. He says
that no fraudster would dare do that and so it is a guaranteed sign of your
commitment. So come on Maureen let's show him he is wrong.

Maureen don't worry I will add $100 or more to the money when I send it over so as
not to cause you to be out of pocket. Remember Maureen I am asking you for a proof
of your good faith. It is just a small token but an important gesture to me. If you
are a moral an upright person then nothing can go wrong. Remember I trust you and I
want this matter completed for your sake as soon as possible. I can imagine that you
must be under a lot of pressure at the moment and I want to relieve that pressure as
soon as possible.

Rob can transfer the $4,600 as soon as I give him the go ahead.

Your Uncle Stink

I ain't never seen before
Don't know what it is

messages.subject: Re: Concerned
messages.body:
Maureen,

Your email has hurt me greatly. You accuse me of calling you names and playing
games. Maureen I would never do that and I am angry that you accuse me of doing so.
I would remind you that I had $4,600 waiting for you at a Western Union office for a
week. How is that a sign of someone who plays games?

The whole reason for this correspondence was to offer you assistance as you
originally requested. I have no need for your money, I am a millionaire many times
over. I was merely assisting so that I may offer my expertise and assistance. Now
you turn around and slap me in the face. How dare you!

You asked for my help, not me for yours. If your bank President is so insistent on
corresponding with me have him email me. I am a busy man and haven't got the time to
speak on the phone to someone I hardly understood on the message service.

If $50 is a problem send a smaller amount it is not the amount that is important. It
is just a proof of your good faith. It is a small token and the exact amount is
irrelevant.

Your Uncle Stink, hurt upset and annoyed.

messages.subject: Re: Call to PHILLIP MOMOH
messages.body:
Dear Uncle Stink.

A Very nice day to you and your entire house hold.I recieved your mail message and
the content well understood.

I read your mail about your contact with the bank manager and was so surprise
thatyou said that the bank manager said he had no idea about this transaction.

I have actually been in contact with the bank director and he told me since he has
nothing to do in the transfering of the fund and that I have previously reported him
to the bank president about him conspiring with your late butler to divert this money
about to be transfered,that was why he decide to lie to you that he doesn't know
anything about this transaction as he has no power over anything that concerns this
particular money my late father kept with their bank,he went further to tell me that
he denied not identifying the voice of the bank president.

So ,Uncle Stink,I was at the bank to actually informed the bank president of your
intensions for him to call your Robert Slicker but my visit to the bank to see him
was proved abortive as I waited a long time to see him but could not so I had to
live a message with his secetary.

Sir,what is the way forward in this transaction ,because you have made me pass too
much stress lately and if not that my late father personally adviced me that I
should make sure I invest this money with the help of a foriegn assistance at your
country U.K,I would have withdrawn for a long time and what do you surgest we do
now,because the bank president has actually promised that there is a way he can
assist me out in this my predicaments,through their diplomatic connections but until
he hears from my partner ,so you will still be expecting to hear from him .

I await to hear from you soonest so as to know the best way forward in this
transaction.

best regard,

Maureen.

messages.subject: WAITING TO READ YOUR URGENT RESPONCE TO THIS ISSUE
messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

COMPLEMENT OF THE SEASON AND HOW IS THE DAY WITH YOU OVER THERE IN YOUR COUNTRY
,HOPE ALL IS WELL OVER THERE.

SIR,I RECIEVED YOUR MAIL AND I HAVE BEEN VERY SICK ,I COULD NOT GO OUT FOR THREE
DAYS NOW TO CHECK MY MAIL BOX BECAUSE THE BUSINESS CENTER I GO TO CHECK MY MAILS IS
VERY FAR FROM WHERE I AM PRESENTELY STAYING.

I ALSO RECIEVED A MESSAGE FROM MY BANK PRESIDENT THAT YOUR BANKER CALLED HIM AND WAS
TALKING ABOUT FRAUD.FROM EVERYTHING THAT HAS BEEN HAPPENING FOR SOME TIME NOW I SEEM
TO BE VERY WORRIED AND CONFUSED.EACH TIME ANY HELP IS COMING UP YOU OR YOUR
ASSOCIATES MAKE THINGS VERY DIFFICULT FOR ME ,IF NOT FOR THE HELP OF MY CHURCH REV
FATHER.AND HIS ADVICE ,MAY BE I WOULD HAVE BEEN DEAD BY NOW FROM FRAUSTRATION .

THIS IS AS A RESULT OF THIS TRANSACTION BECAUSE YOU HAVE MADE ME TO TRUST YOU AT THE
BEGINING OF THIS TRANSACTION AND I FELT BY NOW THAT I WOULD BE IN THE U.K,ALSO I HAVE
SOMEHOW BECOME A LIAR IN THE SITE OF MY CHURCH MEMBERS THAT I COLLECTED GIFT FROM
PEOPLE THAT I WILL BE FINALLY LEAVING THIS COUNTRY AND UPTILL NOW THAT I AM STILL
HERE WITHOUT NO PLANS TO LEAVE SOON.

UNCLE,IF I MUST BELIEVE ALL YOU HAVE BEEN SAYING ABOUT ADVANCE FRAUD WHICH IS THE
ADVANCE IN IT. FRAUD AS I WAS MENT TO UNDERSTAND BY MY REV FATHER,IS AN ILLEGAL ACT
AND I SEE NO REASON WHY A BANK WILL BE DOING ANY ILLEGAL BUSINESS TRANSACTION WITH
THIER CUSTOMERS.SO YOU CAN SEE WHY I AM SO CONFUSED.

ALSO I WOULD WANT US TO PROCEED IN THE TRANSFERING OF THIS FUND INTO YOUR BANK
ACCOUNT SO THAT YOU CAN HAVE PROFF THAT ALL I HAVE BEEN TELLING YOU ABOUT THIS FUND
IS REAL.

UNCLE,I HAVE BEGED THE BANK PRESIDENT TO DO ANYTHING POSSIBLE TO ASSIST ME IN
TRANSFERING THIS FUND TO YOU AT U.K BECAUSE MY LATE FATHER UNTIL HIS DEATH AT HIS
SIC BED ADVICED ME THAT I SHOULD INVEST THIS MONEY WITH THE HELP OF A FORIEGNER FROM
U.K AND SPECIFICALLY AT U.K.

THE PROBLEM WE ARE FACED NOW IS THAT THE BANK PRESIDENT HAS MADE ME UNDERSTAND THAT
WE CAN NOT TRANSFER THIS MONEY WITHOUT PROVIDING ALL THE RELEVANT DOCUMENTS FOR
THEIR RECORD PURPOSE,HE SAID IT IS BECAUSE YOU WERE NOT THE PERSON THAT DEPOSITED
THE FUND AND ALSO THAT I AM JUST THE NEXT OF KIN TO THE DEPOSITOR AND AS SUCH ANY
THING THAT HAPPENS TO ME IS THEIR CONCERN AS MY LATE FATHER WAS ONE OF THEIR MAJOR
CLIENT.

SIR,I WOULD NEED YOUR BEST ADVICE TO THE SUCESS OF THE IMMEDIATE TRANSFER OF THIS
FUND INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT AT U.K.

I AWAIT YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPONCE TO KNOW THE BEST WAY FORWARD IN THIS TRANSACTION.

BEST REGARD TO YOU AND YOUR ENTIRE HOUSEHOLD.

SINCERELY YOURS,
MAUREEN.

messages.subject: Best Way Forward
messages.body:
Maureen,

The best way forward is obvious. You know that I trust you completely. However my
bank manager does not and he was no happier having spoken to the President of the
Bank, who, he tells me, was simply dumb and untrustworthy.

My bank manager says that the transaction should go ahead if you are able to provide
proof of your good faith. You know this is all that is required and I am confused by
the delay. It is a small token and you know that it is not the money that's
important, it's the gesture. I have got the $4,600 secured and ready to send. All I
am asking is for a small token to prove your good faith. I will add $100 to the
total to make sure all your expenses are covered.

How many times do I have to explain this? Do you want my help or not?

Your Uncle Stink

messages.subject: Re: Best Way Forward
messages.body:
Maureen,

> I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO AGAIN TO
> MAKE THIS TRANSACTION SUCESSFULL

Yes you do. All you have to do is show proof of your good faith.

> WHAT I STILL DONT UNDERSTAND IS THAT YOU ALWAYS CLAIM TO BE
> RIGHT ALL THE TIME

My staff have a saying - "Uncle Stink is always right". They trust me to always make
the right decision and I have not disappointed them yet. Maureen you don't become a
multi-millionaire by being stupid.

> I MUST LET YOU KNOW THAT IF THESE PEOPLE ARE
> NOT GOOD ENOUGH THEY CAN ATTAIN TO THE LEVEL THEY ARE
> NOW.FOR EXAMPLE THE BANK DIRECTOR AND THE BANK PRESIDENT

Maureen, it's not difficult to come first in a running race when you race against
cabbages.

> UNCLE,I WILL GET BACK TO YOU AS SOON AS I CAN COME UP WITH
> SOME AMOUNT OF MONEY

Good girl. That's the way to do it. We'll show Rob that he was wrong.

Once you have shown proof of your good faith I will take over this transaction and
costs completely and relieve you of the burden.

I await to hear from you.

Your Uncle Stink

U.K.iI KNOW YOU WILL BE SURPRICE OVER MY LONG SILENCE SINCE YOUR LAST MAIL TO ME,IT
HAS BEEN FOR MY TOTAL CONFUSION THAT HAS MADE ME NOT TO REACH YOU SINCE.THANK GOD
THAT EVERYTHING IS MOVING POSITIVELY .

UNCLE,I HAVE BEEN MAKING ALL NECESSARY ARRANGEMENT LATELY FOR THE SUCESS OF THIS
TRANSACTION AND THE BANK PRESIDENT OF THE BANK THAT MY LATE FATHER DEPOSITED THIS
FUND HAS JUST TRAVELED TO UNITED STATES OF AMERICA FOR SOME MONTHS COURSE AND BEFORE
HE LEFT HE HANDED ME OVER TO THE INTERNATIONAL REMITANCE OFFICER AFTER HE HAS
DISCOUVERED THAT EVEN IF THE BANK RECIEVED THE NECESSARY DOCUMENTS REQUIRED TO
TRANSFER THIS FUND OUT FROM THEIR BANK,

ALTHOUGH THEY HAVE BOTH PROMISED TO DO EVERYTHING TO MAKE SURE THIS MONEY IS
TRANSFERED TO U.K BEFORE THE END OF THE COMING WEEK.

THERE ARE STILL SOME OTHER DOCUMENTS THAT WILL HINDER THE SUCESSFUL TRANSFER OF THIS
FUND INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT OVER THERE IN U.K,THEY BOTH MADE ME UNDERSTAND THAT THE
NEW BANKING ECTHICS OF UNITED NATION OVER ANY FUND MORE THAN 2 MILLION U.S DOLLARS
BEIGN TRANSFERED OUT OF AFRICA MUST FIRST ALSO OBTAIN A CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE FROM
AFRICA ECONOMY STATEING THAT THE FUND IS NOT DRUG MONEY OR MENT FOR TERORIST
OPERATION ,SO AS I AM SICK AND TIRED OF DELAYED I BEGED THEM ON HOW THEY CAN ASSIST
ME IN THE TRANSFER SINCE MY FORIEGN PARTNER WHICH IS YOU DO NOT BELIEVE IN THE
TRANSACTION AND WOULD NOT WANT TO ASSIST FINACIALLY ,SO THEY MADE A SURGESTION THAT
I SHOULD GIVE YOU THE CONTACT OF THE NEW INTERNATIONAL REMITTANCE OFFICER SO THAT
YOU CAN CALL HIM FOR MORE CLEARIFICATION ,HE ALSO SAID HE MIGHT AS WELL DISCUSE WITH
YOUR BANKER DUE TO THE FACT THAT HE BELIEVES THAT IT IS ONLY YOUR BANKER THAT WOULD
UNDERSTAND THE NEW BANKING ECTHICS REGARDING FORIEGN TRANSFER.

HERE IS THE BANK INTERNATIONAL REMMITANCE OFFICERS CONTACT FOR YOU OR YOUR BANKER TO
CONTACT HIM IMMEDIATELY SO THAT THIS FUND CAN BEE TRANSFERED INTO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT
AS SOON AS POSIBLE. WIANY EXPENSES FROM YOUR SIDE IN OBTAINING ALL THESES RELEVANT
DOCUMENTS ,RIGHT NOW I ONLY NEED YOU FOR THE INVESTMENT OF THIS FUND ALONE,AND ALSO
FOR MY WAREFARE IN OBTAING A GOOD SCHOOL TO CONTINUE MY EDUCATION AT U.K THERE.

DR MIKE DAVID

++2250 7366 XXX.

PLEASE GET BACK TO ME WITH FEEDBACK AS SOON AS YOU DISCUSE WITH HIM .

I AWAIT YOUR URGENT RESPONCE AS YOU HAVE CONTACT WITH THE BANK.

BEST REGARDS,

SINCERELY YOURS,

MAUREEN.

N/B

I WAS NOT ABLE TO SEND YOU THE TOKEN OF PROFF YOU ASKED FOR DUE TO THE FACT THAT I
AM LIVING IN THE CHURCH AND HERE IS NOT MY COUNTRY ,I HAVE LITTLE TO TAKE CARE OF MY
DAILY NEED AND AS SUCH I COULD NOT RISK SENDING OUT ALL THE MONEY WITH ME ,COUPLED
WITH MY CHURCH PASTOR'S ADVICE IF YOU REALLY WQANT TO ASSIST ,YOU SHOULD'NT HAVE TO
WORRY ME TO SEND YOU SOME MONEY FIRST.

messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

THANK YOU FOR YOUR EMAIL AND I ALSO APPRECIATE YOUR EFFORT AND YOUR GUINUE
WILLINGNESS TO ASSIST ME IN THE TRANSFER OF THIS FUND.I HAVE BEEN THINKING ABOUT THE
DWARF TROWING COMPLEX RESENTELY BUT DUE TO THE FACT THAT I AM SO CONFUSED ABOUT THE
TURN OUT OF THINGS LATELY I COULD NOT REACH YOU SINCE.

I HAVE ACTUALLY BEEN THING OF WHAT WE CAN DO TO CONTINUE THIS TRANSACTION AND AS THE
BANK PRESIDENT HAS ADVICE THAT YOU ARE NOT A SERIOUS PERSON ALTHOUGH I DO NOT BELIEVE
HIM BUT JUST FOR THE TOKEN THAT YOU REQUESTED FROM ME THAT HAS BEEN THE REASON WHY I
HAVE NOT CONTACTED YOU SINCE,MY CHURCH PASTOR THAT WAS SURPOSE TO BE LENDING ME A
HELPING HAND TILL I CONCLUDE THE TRANSFERING OF THIS FUND OUT OF AFRICA HAS MADE ME
ALSO KNOW THAT IF YOU REALLY WANT TO ASSIST ME THAT YOU DO NOT NEED A TOKEN FIRST
AND I MADE HIM KNOW ABOUT YOUR BANKER WHO IS NOT SATISFIED THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS
A GENUIE TRANSACTION BUT HE STILL HESITATE TO BE A PART OF RAISING ANY MONEY FOR ME
TO SEND TO YOU.

UNCLE ,PLEASE IF THERE IS ANY WAY YOU CAN COME DOWN HERE OR RATHER SEND SOMEBODY
DOWN HERE SO THAT WE WILL BOTH GO TO THE BANK TO RETRIEVE THIS FUND OUT FROM THE
BANK AND TRANSFER TO YOUR PRIVATE BANK ACCOUNT OVER THERE IJ U.K ,I WOULD HAVE BEEN
SO GRATEFUL.

I AM AN ORPHAN AND LIVING IN A FORIEGN COUNTRY ,I REALLY HAVE MUCH FOR MYSELF HERE
AND I HAVE EARLIER TOLD YOU ABOUT MY LATE FATHERS RELATIVES AND HIS BUSINESS
ASSOCIATES WHO ARE AFTER MY LIFE IF I REFUSE TO HANDLE THEM THE CERTIFICATE OF
DEPOSITE WHICH I SENT YOU A COPY AND THE CONTACT OF THE BANK WHERE THE MONEY IS
,THEY WILL KILL ME AS WELL ,SO YOU CAN SEE THAT I AM VERY CONFUSE,IT PAINS ME TO
THINK ABOUT STILL BEEN IN AFRICA AFTER I HAVE CONCLUDED WITH THE TRAVELLING AGENCY
THAT AGREED TO ASSIST ME IN MY COMING OVER TO U.K.

SIR,I REALLY DONT KNOW HOW TO PLEAD THAT YOU SHOULD JUST SIMPLY TAKE A STEP OF FAITH
IN COMING OVER TO AFRICA AS FAR AS YOU SEEMS NOT TO TRUST ME OR YOU MAY RATHER SEND
SOMEBODY DOWN TO ASSIST ME IN THIS TRANSFER SO THAT HE OR SHE WILL SIGN EVERY
NECASSARY DOCUMENTS REQUIRED FOR THE TRANSFERING OF THIS FUND INTO THE BANK ACCOUNT
THAT YOU WILL PROVIDE.

THANKS FOR YOUR PATIENCE AND EFFORT SO FAR IN THIS TRANSACTION AND I WILL BE
SINCERELY WAITING FOR YOUR RESPONCE TOWARDS THIS ISSUE.

BEST REGARD

MAUREEN.

Dear Nigel Shagnasty-Farder,

I really dont know what to say because I am not sure you know what you are doing,You
were instructed by Uncle Stink to come to assist me in the release and transfer of
the fund my late father deposited with bank of africa here in Cote d'Ivoire,

So i see no reason why you have to go to south africa and I dont think you are in
the process of transfering this fund that my late father deposited because it is not
posible for you to do that on my behalf without my knowledge.

I would want to know who is Mr Jonnathan Tadobe and how he became the senior
international remittance officer this is because the bank has only one international
remittance officer that I know which is Dr Mike David Kante.

I still dont know or rather understand what you are saying that you are in south
africa doing the transfering of my late fathers fund when the fund is deposited here
in abidjan.

Sir,I am dying slowing from this arrangement that you are telling me about ,I have
never been to south africa ,I believe you are into some other transaction somewhere
,not my own transaction because this fund in question is deposited here and the bank
officails were with me at the international airport yersterday and we waited in vain
till all the passengers came off the aircraft that you gave me the flight scedule
and for your information ,the bank was not surpose to claim any amount from you ,the
required some documents from us and as we went tothe ministry of justice for the
required documents they asked us to pay legal charges to obtain it that was the
reason for the four thousand six hundred u.s.dollars that you were surpose to come
with and another additional one thousand u.s dollars for opening of a new bank
account .

So ,i would want as a matter that requires urgency for you to contact my bank
presindent to verify this transaction or you rather contact the international
remmittance officer Dr Mike David Kante on his direct line immediately ++225 0736
XXXX.

I will also want you to give me the direct telephone line of the Mr Tadobe  you said
contacted you to change your flight schedule and his
full contact details ,

I personally want to make it clear to you that anything that you are doing in south
africa you are doing at your own risk,this is because it is not my transaction that
took you to south africa and i have also contacted Ucle Stink and he instructed me
that you are capable of assisting me in this transaction and even the bank did not
know about your coming until i contacted them about you coming so if you say that
the bank senior international remmittance officer intructed you to change your
flight routh when you quite know that this said sum is deposited in this country
then you must be telling lies maybe you are looking for a srategy to steal the fund
that Unle Stink gave to you to cover any expences that we might need to incure
during the transfering of this fund.

i want to hear from you immediately so that you will not fall victim to which
transaction you are doing with south africa people.

Miss Maureen,

I have received your email and I can see that you are confused. I must assure you
that the bank seem to know exactly what they are doing. Mr Jonnathan Tadobe is the
Senior International Remittance Officer for the Bank of Africa here in South Africa
and he is taking good care of me.

I am meeting with him again tomorrow. It seems that they decided to transfer your
fund to South Africa due to the uncertain political situation there in your country.
Do not be afraid. This time tomorrow your fund will be released and you will be a
rich woman.

I hope that it all becomes clearer to you if I copy below the email we received from
Jonnathan Tadobe on Monday morning.

Im sure Mr Tadobe will be able to answer any questions you have. Why not send him
an email at jonnathantadobe@xxx As you can see he is Dr David Smith Kantes superior
officer.

Miss Maureen, I believe we are in good hands.


----- Original Message -----
From: "Jonnathan Tadobe  Bank of Africa"
To: "Nigel Shagnasty-Farder"
Sent: 3 November 2003 03:53
Subject: Miss Maureen Adje Charlse

My Dear Mr Nigel,

I am the Senior International Remittance Officer for the Bank of Africa in South
Africa. My Junior colleague Dr David Smith Kante of our small Cote d'Ivoire branch
has asked me to take over the delicate transaction relating to Miss Maureen Adje
Charlse.

Because of the unrest in Cote d'Ivoire, it has been decided to transfer the complete
fund to South Africa.

Therefore, I would be grateful it you could rearrange your flight schedule so that
you arrive in Johannesburg South Africa rather than the rather dangerous Cote
d'Ivoire. I appreciate that rearranging at such short notice is difficult but we
have only your safety and that of Maureen Adje Charlse in mind.

Everything will be waiting for you on your arrival. We anticipate being able to
release the fund within 48 hours of your arrival. There are some additional expenses
to pay but we can discuss this once you arrive.

Please mail back as soon as possible with your new flight details. I will have one
of the senior bank chauffeurs pick you up from the airport.

I look forward to hearing back from you and meeting you in person.

Dr Jonnathan Tadobe
Senior International Remittance Officer
Bank of Africa
South Africa

messages.body:
Miss Maureen,

I am just leaving South Africa to return to the UK. Dr Jonnathan Tadobe has just
informed me that there is a slight delay in releasing your funds but he is certain
that the funds will be released by Wednesday next.

Apparently the Cote d'Ivoire branch of the Bank of Africa will now release the money
in American Dollars directly to you. You are to make an appointment there next
Wednesday.

Obviously you should avoid speaking with Dr Mike David Kante (if he hasn't already
been dismissed) as he was trying to steal your money.

All in all this transaction has gone very well indeed and I am pleased I have been
able to assist you. Uncle Stink and myself look forward to welcoming you to the UK.

I know Uncle Stink will be very please when he returns, and you too must be a very
happy lady now. Please don't thank me it's all in a days work for me.

Please let us know when you will be arriving and also let us know if there is
anything else you need our help with.

Enjoy your inheritance.

Nigel

messages.subject: What?
messages.body:
Maureen,

I have spent over $18,000 to release your fund and I do not appreciate your jokes. I
have looked at all the correspondence and the bank receipt that Nigel returned with
and it all looks to be in order.

Maureen I am not an idiot and I refuse to invest any more money in to this project.
Your bank has $18,000 of my money to be used as payment as agreed. If they are
unable to release the fund I would like my money back.

The email below came from Jonnathan Tadobe of the Bank of Africa to Nigel. The same
gentleman met Nigel in South Africa. I suggest you stop playing games and start
making sense.

Your Uncle Stink

Africa. My Junior colleague Dr David Smith Kante of our small Cote d'Ivoire branch
has asked me to take over the delicate transaction relating to Miss Maureen Adje
Charlse.

Because of the unrest in Cote d'Ivoire, it has been decided to transfer the
complete
fund to South Africa.

Therefore, I would be grateful it you could rearrange your flight schedule so that
you arrive in Johannesburg South Africa rather than the rather dangerous Cote
d'Ivoire. I appreciate that rearranging at such short notice is difficult but we
have only your safety and that of Maureen Adje Charlse in mind.

Everything will be waiting for you on your arrival. We anticipate being able to
release the fund within 48 hours of your arrival. There are some additional
expenses
to pay but we can discuss this once you arrive.

of the senior bank chauffeurs pick you up from the airport.

I look forward to hearing back from you and meeting you in person.

Dr Jonnathan Tadobe
Senior International Remittance Officer
Bank of Africa
South Africa

messages.subject: Your money is waiting
messages.body:
Maureen,

Despite the fact that you stole $18,000 from me, I feel morally obliged to write to
inform you that I have just sold our Dwarf Throwing Complex for a considerable
profit.

As I am a man of honour, I feel bound be our original verbal partnership agreement.
So I have been doing some calculations as follows in UK sterling:

Initial investment by you = 1,700,000 (still to be paid)
interest on 1,700,000 borrowed from me to cover above = 37,500
$18,050 release fee paid by Nigel to your bank = 10,500
(at today's exchange rate)

Total amount owed by you = 1,748,000

Total income from disposal after all expenditure = 4,762,075
50% share = 2,381,037

less 1,748,000 owed (see above) = 633,037

less Nigel's approximate expenses gives around 630,000

So Maureen your total profit is UK Pounds 630,000. The money is on deposit at my
bank awaiting your instructions. Please let me know what you would have me do with
it.

Your Uncle Stink

messages.subject: I am sorry
messages.body:
Maureen,

It looks like I owe you an apology. Mr Jonnathan Tadobe is nothing but a common
thief. He has swindled me out of $18,000 pretending that the money was to release
your fund.

I have done some investigation and it seems that he is not a banker at all and the
information he provided about himself is completely false.

What a fool I have been, will you ever forgive me?

Please write back soon.

Your Uncle Stink

messages.body:
DEAR UNCLE STINK,

COMPLEMENT OF THE SEASON AND HOW ARE YOU DOING ? I HOPE FINE .AS FOR ME I WOULD HAVE
BEEN OKAY IF NOT FOR ALL THE THE HEART ACHE AND WORRIES THAT YOU GAVE ME THAT I AM
STILL TRYING TO RECOUVER FROM.IN YOUR MAIL YOU SAID THAT YOU HAVE BEEN ROBED OF SOME
AMOUNT OF MONEY BY THE SO CALLED MR JONATHAN THAT I HAVE NEVER HEARD OF ,EVEN BEFORE
THEN I WARNED YOU ONLY YOU WOULD NOT LISTEN TO ME.

WELL,i am geting better as you can see but whats still surprising me is how come
theses people or the so called mr jonathan know about this fund and how did he come
about collecting money from you people when all the necessary documents regarding
the fund are with me .ANYWAY FOR YOUR INFORMATION THIS FUND HAS BEEN TRANSFERED TO
NETHERLAND THE REMMITANCE OFFICE OF THE BANK OF AFRICA OVER THERE IN UEROPE SO THAT
THE FUND WILL BE SAFE FROM ANY RELATIVES OR PERSONS THAT WOULD WANT TO STEAL AWAY
THIS FUND WITHOUT MY CONCENT.

SINCE THE BEGINING OF THIS YEAR I HAVE BEEN FACING FINACIAL DIFFICULTIES DUE TO THE
PRESENT UNSTABLE POLITICAL INSTABILITY OF THIS COUNTRY AND THE HOTEL THAT I USED TO
LODGE IN HAS BEEN CLOSED DOWN SO I HAD TO GO TO THE INTERIOR PART OF THE CITY IN
WHICH I HAVE INCURED SOME BILLS SO PLEASE SIR ,can you be so good to assist me with
some amount of money to offset this bills before things get at of handand I WILL
FOREVER BE GRATEFUL

I WILL EXPECT TO HEAR FROM YOU SOONEST SO AS TO KNOW WHAT ACTUALLY WE WILL HVE TO DO
TO TRANSFER THIS FUND TO YOU SAFELY.

WAITING TO HEAR FROM YOU SOONEST.

BEST REGARD

MAUREEN.

messages.subject: Some News
messages.body:
Maureen,

I am so sorry I have not been in touch. Is it too late to assist you?

I had to go away to finish the gender realignment. It's been my little secret but
for two years now I have been planning this operation and now all is complete. At
the beginning of the month I booked in to a private clinic in Switzerland and the
final stage of the gender realignment procedure took place (otherwise known as a sex
change operation).

I am very happy to tell you that I am now officially a woman and I am no longer
trapped in a man's body. My dreams have been realised. My new name is Nellie
Smith-Bidet and my staff and friends now call me Aunty Stink.

Maureen, I don't think the bank ever did contact me so please have them make contact
as soon as possible.

I hope you are well.

Your Aunty Stink

messages.subject: Re: Some News
messages.body:
Maureen,

Your email was most rude. After all I have done for you and now you tell me you are
sick and tired of our correspondence. Just for a moment think about my circumstances
and not your own.

I have been through a serious life-changing operation and I expected some nice words
from you and not plain rudeness.

If you don't want my help then I'll simply get on with my new life. If you do, you
can help yourself by providing me with fresh information.

Your Aunty Stink
